name: King and Death
description:
A Game made in 72 hours
Please enjoy! 

Please dont be mad that this is SUPER based on Inscryption. Its one of my favorite games so I was inspired 

Click a piece to try to pick it up
Click a empty tile to place them
Scroll or W-S to move around the view

The balance is wack, sorry bout that!

All sounds under CC0 from https://freesound.org/
Clock Model and Textures
https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/household/other/low-poly-analog-alarm-cl...

Music: 
Blue Intermission by congusbongus
